dc:title: On Pilgrimage - March/April 1974
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the misery she sees and their efforts to open a new women's house of hospitality. Diary-like account of visits to friends in Virginia, Georgia, and the William Miller (her biographer) family in Florida.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 539 1974-03-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
